title: Roku Smart TV
description: Roku is a versatile little box that turns your dumb TV into a Smart TV. It makes streaming to your TV easy as pie, even for the most technically-challenged. Plenty of options to choose from to pick the right system for your recipient.

title: NBA Tickets
description: For a thoughtful last-minute gift for basketball fans, give them tickets to watch their favorite team play live.

title: MLB Tickets
description: Nothing more American than a baseball game. A classic and thoughtful gift.

title: NFL Football Tickets
description: Pick up some NFL tickets for an upcoming game if you're pressed for time. Your football fan will love them!

title: Concert Tickets
description: Taylor Swift, Justin Bieber, Adele, and more. Concert tickets are always an impressive and thoughtful last-minute gift.

title: Magazine Subscription to USA Today
description: Keeping up with current events can be exhausting, but with a USA Today subscription, they'll get magazines, online access, and mobile access for browsing on the go.

title: Subscription for a Team of Personal Assistants
description: FancyHands gives you a team of personal assistants to schedule appointments, call customer service, and make reservations for you. A nice, relaxing gift for that someone who never seems to have enough time.

title: Flower arrangements from 1-800-Florals
description: Flowers are the time-honored way of showing someone you care. Sending a beautiful bouquet of flowers will brighten up their day. 1-800 Florals specializes in the classics like roses, but has a decent selection of non-traditional arrangements and gifts too.
